abstract: Micron Technology thinks the release of new Windows software and the industry’s shrinking capacity will help it survive this shakeout.
snippet: Micron Technology thinks the release of new Windows software and the industry’s shrinking capacity will help it survive this shakeout.
lead_paragraph: The memory chip business has destroyed many companies with its vicious price wars. But Micron Technology, a veteran of previous battles, is hunkered down, betting that major cost-cutting and a new high-speed chip will help it survive this bloodbath.

headline.main: Despite Turmoil in the Chip Industry, Signs of Hope for Micron Technology
headline.print_headline: Despite Turmoil in the Chip Industry, Signs of Hope for Micron Technology
